chunk:
Garden of Eve Facial Cleanse or Mask (2019 formulation)

Brand: Garden of Eve

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Bentonite clay, organic Avena sativa (Oats), organic Irish Moss

Directions: Place 1/4 tsp in palm of wet hand, aplly to face; rinse with warm face cloth
book: 3006-Garden of Eve Facial Cleanse or Mask (2019 formulation)
